title: `rclone config reconnect` disables Shared Drive if you answer no to "Change current Shared Drive (Team Drive) ID"
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
If I use `rclone config reconnect` with Google Drive, and then answer no to the "Change current Shared Drive (Team Drive) ID" prompt, then it will reconfigure the remote as a non-Shared Drive. I would expect it to leave it as-is, since I answered "no" to "change" - it is not asking me if I want to configure it as a Shared Drive, but rather if I want to change the current state.


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
```
rclone v1.56.0-beta.5580.aab29353d
- os/version: debian 10.10 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 4.19.0-16-amd64 (x86_64)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.16.5
- go/linking: static
- go/tags: none
```


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)
Debian 10 64-bit


#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)
Google Drive


#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
rclone config reconnect td:
rclone lsf td:Private
```


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
‚ùØ rclone -vv config reconnect td:
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.56.0-beta.5580.aab29353d" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "config" "reconnect" "td:"]
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/nyuszika7h/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : td: config in: state="", result=""
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : td: config out: out=&{State:*oauth,teamdrive,, Option:<nil> OAuth:<nil> Error: Result:}, err=<nil>
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : td: config in: state="*oauth,teamdrive,,", result=""
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : td: config out: out=&{State:*oauth-confirm,teamdrive,, Option:true OAuth:<nil> Error: Result:}, err=<nil>
2021/07/09 12:58:01 DEBUG : td: config: reading config parameter "config_refresh_token"

n) No
y/n> y

2021/07/09 12:58:06 DEBUG : td: config out: out=&{State:*oauth-do,teamdrive,, Option: OAuth:<nil> Error: Result:}, err=<nil>

2021/07/09 12:58:24 DEBUG : Saving config "token" = "{\"access_token\":\"[REDACTED]\",\"token_type\":\"Bearer\",\"refresh_token\":\"[REDACTED]\",\"expiry\":\"2021-07-09T13:58:23.259126987+02:00\"}" in section "td" of the config file
```
